question: Which one of the following is the correct statement?
option1: The modern Kochi was a Dutch colony till Indiaâ€™s independence
option2: The Dutch defeated the Portuguese and built Fort Williams in the modern Kochi
option3: The modern Kochi was first a Dutch colony before the Portuguese took over from them
option4: The modern Kochi never became a part of the British colony
answer: The Dutch defeated the Portuguese and built Fort Williams in the modern Kochi
explanation:
No statement is correct. Modern Kochi became a part of the British colony after being a Dutch colony. Kochi was first a Portuguese colony.
Fort Williams was built in Calcutta (not in Kochi) by the English.
